stages.logText: Umar told me to visit Defy in Sullengard to instruct him to give the villagers their share.
Defy told me that there will be a delay in giving the villagers of Sullengard their far share for some unknown reason. I must report this to Umar at once.
Umar instructed me to talk to Defy once more.
I reported back to Umar about Defy's disappearance together with his men. But Umar didn't believe me and he even sent me back to find them. I better ask the villagers there.
There was a distressed man, whom just had his first child, who hinted to me of wherabouts of Defy and his men. I must report this to Umar once more.
With Sullengard running in financial trouble, Umar is enraged by Defy's traitorous way.
Umar gave me a task to give the mayor at least 50000 gold coins as a promised share for their living. After that, I'm instructed to report back immediately.
At last, Sullengard can now sleep calmly and eat sufficiently with their financial losses restored.
